SamPy.smakced.getSmackedData.Smakced¶

class SamPy.smakced.getSmackedData.Smakced(url, table)¶

A Class related to SMAKCED collaboration wiki page.

__init__(url, table)¶

Constructor

Parameters:
  • url (string) – url address of the page
  • table (string) – name of the table

Methods

__init__(url, table) Constructor
getData() Retrieve data from the SMAKCED web page.
parseTable(data) Parses html table data using BeautifulSoup.
writeToFile(data, output) Writes an html page that contains tables to a file in ascii format.
